example.parse: (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN اجتماع) (NP-SBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN وفد)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NP (PRON_3MS ه)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-3))))) (PP-MNR (PREP ب) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN رئاسة) (NP (NOUN_PROP سعادة))) (CONJ و) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN حضور) (NP (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN نائب) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN النقيب))) (NP (NOUN_PROP جمال) (DET+NOUN_PROP الحسامي))) (CONJ و) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الامين) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN العام)) (NP (NOUN_PROP وليد) (NOUN_PROP جرادي))) (CONJ و) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN نائب) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه))) (NP (NOUN_PROP تحسين) (NOUN_PROP سرور))) (CONJ و) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN عضو) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN المجلس))) (NP (NOUN_PROP يوسف) (DET+NOUN_PROP الخوري))))))) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN وزير) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN العمل))) (NP (NOUN_PROP علي) (NOUN_PROP قانصو))) (SBAR (SBAR (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON الذي)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS ابدى) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC تفهماً) (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_ACC تاماً)) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN افكار) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN النقابة))))))))

arg.g: Under the chairmanship of His Excellency and the presence of Vice President of Jamal Husami and the secretary general and his deputy, Walid Grady and Tahsin Surur and Board Member Joseph Khoury

example.arg: برئاسة سعادة و حضور نائب النقيب جمال الحسامي و الامين العام وليد جرادي و نائبه تحسين سرور و عضو المجلس يوسف الخوري

arg.g: with Minister of Labor Ali Qanso

example.parse: اجتماع الزعماء العرب على تحرير القدس
